title: Cannot use saved credentials
author: app/
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

## Expected Behavior

I expect to connect to the machine via RDP without entering credentials.

## Current Behavior

For some machines, when I attempt to connect to an RDP server, I get the message **"server's authentication policy does not allow connection requests using saved credentials"**  and I must type in the password to connect.  However, when I use the built-in Windows RDP client, I don't get the same message. ...

comments.author: sparerd
comments.snippet:
This is not related to mRemoteNG, but rather a group policy setting set on the server.

Here are a few articles on it:
- https://answers.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/forum/windows_7-security/remote-desktop-connection-not-using-saved/13a17d84-b008-4767-95fb-b891e9e6bc66
- https://serverfault.com/questions/279661/server-policy-problem-client-gets-your-credentials-did-not-work-when-connecti
- https://myworldofit.net/?p=1210
